add.description: Add a deployment to be secured by Keycloak

remove.description: Remove a deployment to be secured by Keycloak

SP.description: A security provider configuration for secure deployment

*.description: A security provider configuration for secure deployment

autodetectBearerOnly.description: Set to true if the application serves both a web application and web services (e.g. SOAP or REST). It allows redirection of unauthenticated users of the web application to the Keycloak login page, but send an HTTP 401 status code to unauthenticated SOAP or REST clients instead

forceAuthentication.description: Redirected unauthenticated request to a login page

isPassive.description: If user isn't logged in just return with an error.  Used to check if a user is already logged in or not

keepDOMAssertion.description: Attribute to inject the DOM representation of the assertion into the SamlPrincipal (respecting the original syntax)

roleMappingsProviderConfig.description: The configuration properties of the role mappings provider

roleMappingsProviderId.description: The string that identifies the role mappings provider to be used within the SP

turnOffChangeSessionIdOnLogin.description: The session id is changed by default on a successful login.  Change this to true if you want to turn this off

add.description: Add a security provider configuration to deployment secured by Keycloak SAML

autodetectBearerOnly.description: Set to true if the application serves both a web application and web services (e.g. SOAP or REST). It allows redirection of unauthenticated users of the web application to the Keycloak login page, but send an HTTP 401 status code to unauthenticated SOAP or REST clients instead

forceAuthentication.description: Redirected unauthenticated request to a login page

isPassive.description: If user isn't logged in just return with an error.  Used to check if a user is already logged in or not

keepDOMAssertion.description: Attribute to inject the DOM representation of the assertion into the SamlPrincipal (respecting the original syntax)

roleMappingsProviderConfig.description: The configuration properties of the role mappings provider

roleMappingsProviderId.description: The string that identifies the role mappings provider to be used within the SP

turnOffChangeSessionIdOnLogin.description: The session id is changed by default on a successful login.  Change this to true if you want to turn this off

remove.description: Remove a security provider definition from deployment secured by Keycloak SAML

*.description: A key configuration for service provider or identity provider

CertificatePem.description: Certificate key string in pem format

PrivateKeyPem.description: Private key string in pem format

PublicKeyPem.description: Public key string in pem format

encryption.description: Key can be used for encryption

signing.description: Key can be used for signing

CertificatePem.description: Certificate key string in pem format

PrivateKeyPem.description: Private key string in pem format

PublicKeyPem.description: Public key string in pem format

encryption.description: Key can be used for encryption

signing.description: Key can be used for signing

AllowedClockSkew.description: Allowed clock skew between the IDP and the SP

unit.description: Time unit for the value of the clock skew. Values: MINUTES, SECONDS, MILLISECONDS, MICROSECONDS, NANOSECONDS

value.description: Allowed clock skew value between the IDP and the SP

HttpClient.description: Configuration of HTTP client used for automatic retrieval of certificates for signature validation

allowAnyHostname.description: Define if hostname validation should be disabled (true) or not (false)

clientKeystore.description: Path to the keystore that contains client certificates for two-way SSL

disableTrustManager.description: Define if SSL certificate validation should be disabled (true) or not (false)

proxyUrl.description: URL to the HTTP proxy, if applicable

truststore.description: Path to the truststore used to validate the IDP certificates

socketTimeout.description: Timeout for socket waiting for data in milliseconds

connectionTimeout.description: Timeout for establishing the connection with the remote host in milliseconds

connectionTtl.description: The connection time to live in milliseconds

requestBinding.description: HTTP method to use for request

responseBinding.description: HTTP method to use for response

requestBinding.description: HTTP method to use for requests

responseBinding.description: HTTP method to use for responses

assertionConsumerServiceUrl.description: Endpoint of Assertion Consumer Service at SP

metadataUrl.description: The URL used to retrieve the IDP metadata from

signaturesRequired.description: Require signatures for SingleSignOnService and SingleLogoutService
